item.title: Daily goals
item.description: Starting today, I want to document my journey to making my first million dollars. I will set goals each day before I go to bed, follow through the next day when I wake up, and repeat the process until I reach my goal.

item.title: Discipline
item.description: Do the hard work, especially when you don’t feel like it Here’s my daily routine: Morning 7:00 AM: Wake up, get out of bed, and walk straight into cold shower ...

item.title: Welcome to my blog!
item.description: My name is Allen Lin and I’m a 4th-year CS student at Northeastern University. I was born in Taiwan and I moved to the United States when I was 13. I’m deeply passionate about AGI, tech entrepreneurship, and education.
